prompts.name: Financial Update Announcement
prompts.description: This template assists the CFO to inform stakeholders about the company's financial updates. Replace {{CFO's name}} with the CFO's full name, {{end of financial period}} with the period the report covers, {{future projections timeframe}} with the period of the upcoming projections.
prompts.content: Draft an announcement from {{CFO's name}} to all stakeholders providing financial updates for the period ending {{end of financial period}}. Discuss performance indicators, budget variances and financial prospects for the next {{future projections timeframe}}. Avoid disclosing sensitive internal finance strategies or unsolidified plans.

prompts.name: Finance Team Meeting Agenda
prompts.description: This prompt supports creating a comprehensive agenda for a finance team meeting. Replace {{CFO's name}} with the CFO's name, {{current financial performance topic}} with the issue or goal currently being addressed, {{future finance initiative}} with any planned finance projects, {{specific issue or solution}} with any challenges or improvements identified.
prompts.content: Prepare an agenda for the upcoming finance team meeting to be conducted by {{CFO's name}}. Main points to cover include our performance on {{current financial performance topic}}, plans for {{future finance initiative}}, and discussions on {{specific issue or solution}}. Avoid including topics unrelated to finance.

prompts.name: Supplier Negotiation Points
prompts.description: This prompt helps to devise negotiation points for supplier contracts. Replace {{CFO's name}} with the CFO's full name, {{supplier's name}} with the supplier's name, {{specific products or services}} with the products or services relevant to this negotiation.
prompts.content: Formulate negotiation points for {{CFO's name}} for the meeting with {{supplier's name}}. Touch on contract length, terms of payment, potential discounts on {{specific products or services}}, and measures in case of supply chain disruptions. Please do not include any sensitive or proprietary company data.

prompts.name: Department Budget Allocation
prompts.description: This template aids the CFO in distributing the budget to different departments. Replace {{CFO's name}} with the CFO's full name and {{department names}} with the names of the departments relevant to this message.
prompts.content: Draft an email for {{CFO's name}} to department heads outlining the new budget allocation. Discuss changes in allocation for {{department names}}, reasoning behind it, and the expected efficiency or performance growth. Please avoid mentioning any confidential finance strategies or detailed comparisons with previous budgets.

prompts.name: Investor Presentation
prompts.description: This prompt supports CFO in preparing a financial presentation for investors. Replace {{CFO's name}} with CFO's full name, {{financial metrics}} with the relevant financial data, {{key project or initiative}} with the project or initiative the allocated capital will be used for, {{forecast timeframe}} with the time period the forecast covers.
prompts.content: Create a set of slides for a presentation by {{CFO's name}} to our investors. Key points should include an overview of the previous quarterâ€™s {{financial metrics}}, plans for capital use in {{key project or initiative}}, and financial forecasts for the next {{forecast timeframe}}. Avoid speculation and ensure all information is supported by sound financial data.

prompts.name: Cash Flow Statement
prompts.description: This template aids the CFO in presenting a clear overview on the firm's cash flow situation. Replace {{CFO's name}} with CFO's full name, {{Income Statement}}, {{Balance Sheet}}, and {{Supplementary Information}} with respective financial data.
prompts.content: Draft a cash flow statement for {{CFO's name}}. It needs to clearly outline the cash generated in operating, investing and financing activities. Be sure to include reconciliation of {{Income Statement}}, changes in {{Balance Sheet}} items, and {{Supplementary Information}}. Do not include any speculative calculations or data.

prompts.name: Business Expansion Proposal
prompts.description: This prompt helps the CFO formulate a proposal for business expansion. Substitute {{CFO's name}}, {{new market}}, {{initial capital investment}} with the relevant details.
prompts.content: Develop a business expansion proposal on behalf of {{CFO's name}} looking to explore {{new market}}. Pen down the investment requirements, approximate turnover, and projected financial risks. Include details about the {{initial capital investment}} and projected timeline. Skip any untimely or inappropriate details.

prompts.name: Financial Risk Analysis
prompts.description: The template is designed to guide CFO in analysing the financial risks involved in a strategy or project. Replace {{CFO's name}}, {{strategy or project}}, {{risk factors}} with suitable data.
prompts.content: Craft a financial risk analysis for {{CFO's name}} on {{strategy or project}}. Discuss potential {{risk factors}}, prospective impacts on profits and mitigating measures. Steer clear of any unrelated elements.

prompts.name: Loan Application
prompts.description: This prompt aids the CFO in applying for a business loan. Substitute {{CFO's name}}, {{loan amount}}, {{purpose of loan}}, {{repayment plan}} with the apt specifications.
prompts.content: Compose a letter on behalf of {{CFO's name}} applying for a business loan of {{loan amount}}. State the {{purpose of loan}}, how it will help business growth, and outline the {{repayment plan}}. Exclude any irrelevant or personal information.

prompts.name: Debt Management Plan
prompts.description: This template assists the CFO in creating a strategy to manage company's debt. Replace {{CFO's name}}, {{short term debt}}, {{long term debt}}, {{debt payment strategy}} with corresponding information.
prompts.content: Formulate a comprehensive debt management plan for {{CFO's name}}. Highlight the current status of {{short term debt}} and {{long term debt}}, propose a {{debt payment strategy}}, and possible impact on company's future financial health. Do avoid including assumptions or unsanctioned financial strategies.
